eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A HAZARDOUS MATERIALS WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Lincoln, MT; AT 02:50 PM ON SEP 24, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 08:50 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the LCSO please evacuate the area around the 500 block of ACM Rd S due to a major propane leak. Avoid the area and updates will be provided as soon as possible.
